main event: Four circular, pale white and dull, almost grey luminous objects were observed in the sky over Grand Rapids, Michigan for 3-1/2 minutes.
interesting points: The objects resembled fluorescent footballs and were at an altitude of about 2,000 feet.
The objects moved in erratic flight, from 2/3 to 1 inch long when viewed.
The objects exhibited erratic behavior, at times hovering, then increasing in speed.
The objects may have become blocked by a building or hill, or the witness may have had 5-10 more seconds of observation before they disappeared.
The objects were described as dark against the sky, with no protrusions or wings observed.
sighted object: four circular, pale white and dull, almost grey luminous objects
